(Koj rewrote the post, so I'll continue where we left off.)

Prebon continued to stare at the other bot. He restrained Spears as 
she "tried" to break free. He was upset at this.

"I repeat Wolf bot, who are you? Ramulus was supposed to come alone, 
as I have. Why are you betraying the trust I gave you, Ramulus. I 
have a good mind to go back to my base and really re-program Spears!"

Meanwile, Ignatius and Blaze were having no luck.

"I can't see anything. If Ramulus did bring back-up, they must be in 
cloak like us." said Ignatius in a secret frequency to all but 
Prebon, Spears and Slayer.

"And I can't get closer to smell without risking all of us. That 
wolf's probably got a great nose, and would know that I'm there in an 
instant."

"Let's go back. There is nothing we can do."

Ignatius and Blaze go back to the group.
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream/Gotron

Starscream spoke to KitKat.

"I was thinking it was too easy as well, but look at the body. The 
Inferno drones were all a different color than Inferno. But this 
thing looked exactly like Megatron. But, like you said, I've known 
Megatron the most, and I think he wouldn't be that dumb to place 
himself in such a predicament. Maybe he downloaded all his files into 
a back-up chip, and than re-installed himself into a new and improved 
body. He sent this fragile shell thing after us, and we killed it, to 
make him think we were dead. But we'll see as Phobia examins the 
body. As for a base, we could stay in your friend destructors for now 
until we find something suitable. I'll go check the caves."

Starscream walked over to the Lavacons.

"You fought well today! As the officer Zardus put in charge over you 
for the time being, I give you the gratitude of the entire group. 
Now, you have a choice. You may remain here with me, in the war, or 
go back to the Alliance. There really is no fighting in the Alliance 
right now, only politics. Think over your decision and tell me."

Starscream was about to enter the caves when Gotron showed up.

"Your ambassador has arrived!"

"Great! I think you better go check in with KitKat, and she'll give 
you all the info. I know it all, but I don't know if we want to tell 
Zardus everything yet."

"All right. See you later!"

Starscream goes and scans the caves, while Gotron goes to talke with 
KitKat.

"Hello, I'm Gotron, Starscream's friend. I'm the ambassador for the 
Alliance. I was wondering what information I'm allowed to forward to 
Zardus."
